languages.text: "Подобным вещам не место в руках простых слуг Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Подобным вещам не место в руках простых слуг Империума".

languages.text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Подобным вещам не место в руках простых слуг Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."
"Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."
"Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."
"Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."

languages.text: “像这样的东西，不该留在帝国卑微的仆人手中。”
languages.original_text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “像这样的东西，不该留在帝国卑微的仆人手中。”

languages.text: «Esta clase de cosa no debe estar en manos de un sirviente indigno del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Esta clase de cosa no debe estar en manos de un sirviente indigno del Imperium».

languages.text: 「そのようなものは、帝国の卑しい従者の手にあるべきものではない」
languages.original_text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「そのようなものは、帝国の卑しい従者の手にあるべきものではない」

languages.text: « Un tel objet n'a rien à faire entre les mains d'{mf|un humble serviteur|une humble servante} de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Un tel objet n'a rien à faire entre les mains d'{mf|un humble serviteur|une humble servante} de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "So was gehört nicht in die Hände eines niederen Dieners des Imperiums."
languages.original_text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "So was gehört nicht in die Hände eines niederen Dieners des Imperiums."

languages.text: "Böylesi nesneler, sıradan bir İmparatorluk hizmetkârının ellerine ait değildir."
languages.original_text: "Such things do not belong in the hands of a lowly servant of the Imperium."
